EmailTemplate.name: KRA remainder mail to reportee
EmailTemplate.subject: Submit the self review for {!Goal__c.Goal_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Resource__c},
Please submit the KRA for {!Goal__c.Goal_Name__c} before {!Goal__c.Quarter_End_Date__c}. For submission click here.
Regards, The Cloud Peritus Team
